description: Apruba Roy is a highly experienced chef with 10 years in the culinary industry. With a portfolio of 50 recipes, Apruba brings creativity and expertise to every dish. cookingMethod:
1. Marinate the fish with turmeric and salt.
2. Heat mustard oil in a pan and fry the fish until golden brown. Set aside.
3. In the same pan, saut√© the onions until translucent.
4. Add the tomatoes and cook until they soften.
5. Add turmeric, salt, and water to make a gravy.
6. Add the fried fish and simmer for a few minutes.
7. Serve hot with steamed rice.

description: Arfan Nisho is a skilled chef with 8 years of experience. Having crafted 40 delightful recipes, Nisho's culinary prowess shines through his creations. His dishes captivate the taste buds of food lovers. With 300 likes, Nisho's recipes are a testament to his talent and dedication.
title: Beef Bhuna
recipe:
Ingredients:

500g beef
2 onions
4 cloves of garlic
2-inch ginger
2 tomatoes
2 green chilies
1 tablespoon red chili powder
1 teaspoon turmeric powder
1 teaspoon cumin powder
1 teaspoon coriander powder
1 teaspoon garam masala
Salt to taste
Oil for cooking

Instructions:

1. Marinate the beef with salt, turmeric powder, and red chili powder.
2. Heat oil in a pan and fry the onions until golden brown.
3. Add the garlic and ginger paste and cook for a minute.
4. Add the marinated beef and cook until it turns brown.
5. Add the tomatoes, green chilies, and the remaining spices.
6. Cover and cook on low heat until the beef is tender and the spices are well blended.
7. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with rice or naan.
